Body:
Logistics

Getting the right stuff to the right place at the right time.

Warehouse Inventory

Manage Intake, Shipments and Inventory Checks. Within Sahana, any Site can have Inventory, but Warehouses have this as a focus.

Asset Tracking

Track Assets throughout their life cycle

Fleet Management

Vehicles are a special class of Asset, with additional attributes. GPS Tracking.

Thankyou certificates

Beneficiary Registration, Logistics
